text: 9.26: Mt 10.33; Mk 8.38; Ru 12.9; 2 T 2.12Nde mbarara, nde guma the ntigem na zɨ gum na buni vhuuin mbergi, Fhe Bakɨme Guma Guar, ana zumgum won Ndia han Hevenan kegɨp, ana won ŋkasŋka vhava ŋaara gum, Fhe Bakɨme ŋkasŋka vhava ŋaar gum, Fhe Bakɨmen enserir ŋaari ŋkasŋka vhava ŋaar, ana mbe phorgɨ zirɨrga. Ana vhɨra mba tugen, mba guman mbergirga.”
